basic.description: This course is a weekly seminar covering topics in biological research. Not repeatable for credit toward major requirements.
basic.subject: BSC
basic.title: Seminar in Biological Frontiers

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, and CHM 1046L.
